Uses of Interface
org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem.BATManaged

Packages that use BATManaged
org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem filesystem package maps OLE 2 Compound document files to a more familiar filesystem interface. 
org.apache.poi.poifs.property property package contains high and low level Property structures for POIFS. 
org.apache.poi.poifs.storage storage package contains low level binary structures for POIFS's implementation of the OLE 2 Compound Document Format. 
 

Uses of BATManaged in org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem
 

Classes in org.apache.poi.poifs.filesystem that implement BATManaged
 class POIFSDocument
          This class manages a document in the POIFS filesystem.
 

Uses of BATManaged in org.apache.poi.poifs.property
 

Classes in org.apache.poi.poifs.property that implement BATManaged
 class NPropertyTable
          This class embodies the Property Table for a NPOIFSFileSystem; this is basically the directory for all of the documents in the filesystem.
 class PropertyTable
          This class embodies the Property Table for the POIFSFileSystem; this is basically the directory for all of the documents in the filesystem.
 class PropertyTableBase
          This class embodies the Property Table for the filesystem, which looks up entries in the filesystem to their chain of blocks.
 

Uses of BATManaged in org.apache.poi.poifs.storage
 

Classes in org.apache.poi.poifs.storage that implement BATManaged
 class BlockAllocationTableWriter
          This class manages and creates the Block Allocation Table, which is basically a set of linked lists of block indices.
 class SmallBlockTableWriter
          This class implements storage for writing the small blocks used by small documents.
